thread.section_title: Elevate Styles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Elevate Styles | elevatestyles.com | 5 of 165
thread.title: Ava Patterson
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by Ava Patterson

author: Ava Patterson
title: Ava Patterson
text: I bought 3 wigs, a detangling brush, and a 2 pack of wig caps. Price came up to $70.76 which is really low considering I bought 1 wig elsewhere that was $80! My package shipped the same day and was delivered within 2 days plus the shipping was free! All the hair is beautiful and exactly as pictured. I'm so happy will definitely be shopping on this site again!
